segments.text: This is a nice place , but you need to get some furniture .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have some I can bring from our place , and there ’ s some more out at my parents ’ .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah . I have one from college at my parents ' house .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure , but I don ’ t have hot water , yet .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , they ’ re coming tomorrow morning to turn the gas on . My phone should be working then , too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , do you want to go get some dinner ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , I can ’ t cook anything until tomorrow , anyway .
segments.speaker: S2
